author: Bill
content:
Good to hear you're out and about again. I really like the repetition, muted colours and curved lines of the windows.

How about "Inside-Looking Out" from The Animals, Retrospective album (http://www.amazon.com/Retrospective-Animals/dp/B0002IQABI) for a song of the day. Makes me think of the unseen people on the other side of all those windows.
